## Sample Data

Sample datasets for these tutorials can be downloaded here:

- [sample_data.vcf.gz](files/sample_data.vcf.gz) (5 MB) — Example VCF file
- [sample_metadata.csv](files/sample_metadata.csv) (10 KB) — Sample information

Or load directly in R:

```r
# Example data is included in the package
library(toolone)
data("example_vcf")
```

## Prerequisites

These tutorials assume you have:

- R (≥ 4.0) and RStudio installed
- Basic familiarity with R syntax
- The following packages installed:

```r
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "vcfR", "toolone"))
```
